title: Healthcare Practice Competency Enhancement: Universal Design for Learning (UDL)-Based Educational Resource Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: UDL educational resources can be designed using the analysis-design-development phases of the ADDIE model
Three or more field-applicable UDL strategies can be proposed by applying knowledge conversion theory (diffusion theory)
The validity of the UDL resource development process can be analyzed and improvement plans drafted using project-based assessment methods

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
